text: for as long as I can remember I've had
this fascination with old abandoned
racetracks
[Music]
kind of places where my granddad and my
father raced where my heroes traded
paignton with their rivals I'm about to
embark on a journey to see and feel the
soul of my sport you really feel the
presence of others and you almost wanted
to look around and see if they were here
it's like their spirit had stayed here
I'm Dale Earnhardt jr. get ready to come
along with us tracing the footsteps of
Forgotten racing history uncovering some
of the greatest characters and stories
the sport has ever known
for nothing is lost that can't be found
and nothing exists that can't be
cherished
you
